text:
I am getting Segmentation Faults with both apache-1.3.26 and apache-1.3.27.
[notice] child pid 17469 exit signal Segmentation fault (11).
I have compiled apache myself with php-4.1.2

./configure --prefix=/usr/share/apache_1.3.27 
--enable-module=most 
--enable-shared=max 
--enable-module=log_agent 
--enable-module=auth_db 
--enable-module=mmap_static
creator: frank@canasoft.net

text:
Do you get this problem when php is not included in the server?  If not,
please report this problem to the php bug database available under
http://www.php.net.

Also see the debugging instructions at 
http://httpd.apache.org/dev/debugging.html
since neither we nor the php developers can do much to help
without at least a backtrace.

text:
Unfortunately, top doesn't really tell us anything useful.  If the seg faults
are occuring only with php scripts, it really does seem to implicate php.
I suggest getting a backtrace and reporting it to the php bug database.
You may want to try on one of the php users mailing lists first.
